backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining CSS variables, themes, and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing app state transitions, spicy mode, and rendering question/yes/no screens.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Celebr: Animated floating hearts component that displays transient celebratory heart visuals.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FunQue: Interactive multi-question component with selectable options and personalized responses.
frontend/src/components/valentine/NoPlay: Playful escalating 'No' response screen showing persuasive messages and a prominent Yes button.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Questi: Provides toggleable spicy mode plus buttons revealing randomized sweet notes, spicy jokes, and optional heart/kiss tap overlays.
Renders the main Valentine question card with moving 'No' button logic, heart animations, and extras including spicy mode.
frontend/src/components/valentine/TapHea: Displays a tappable area that spawns temporary animated heart icons at tap locations.
frontend/src/components/valentine/TapKis: Creates kiss-mark images at tap positions within a tappable overlay and removes them after animation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/YesSuc: Shows the success screen with animated hearts, date ideas, reward passes, and optional fun questions after a 'Yes' response.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the client-side app.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpicyMode.ts: Manages persistent spicy mode state using localStorage with a toggle function.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark romantic themes, global styles, and several custom animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, rendering App into the root element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended romantic color tokens, container settings, fonts, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, and a list of implemented Valentineâ€‘themed interactive features and requirements.
